turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what can I do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to place an order for a coffee at Starbucks, please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like one caramel macchiato, tall with coconut milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one tall Caramel Macchiato, with coconut milk, okay, and what is the location you'd like to pick it up at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to pick it up at

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I found a location on 45 E 51st St, New York, is that the one you're talking about?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: wonderful! okay, and with your drink, did you want any sweeteners?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please. Some honey sweetener would be nice.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Honey, got it! not a problem.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, i think i have it all, or did you want to add anything?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, give me a moment to send it over.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your order has been sent to your desired location. It will be ready for pickup in 5-8 min.
